hopobject.name: green-wireless
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_8_5) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/49.0.2623.75 Safari/537.36
hopobject.body:
<select class="dropdown" id="buy-green">
    <option>Select a distributor to buy</option>
    <optgroup label="North America">
        <option value="http://www.mouser.com/ProductDetail/Seeed-Studio/102010048">Mouser</option>
        <option value="http://www.digikey.com/product-detail/en/seeed-technology-co-ltd/102010048/1597-1367-ND/5965297">Digi-Key</option>
        <option value="http://www.seeedstudio.com/item_detail.html?p_id=2650/">Seeed Studio</option>
    </optgroup>
    <optgroup label="South America (Brazil)">
        <option value="http://br.mouser.com/ProductDetail/Seeed-Studio/102010048">Mouser</option>
        <option value="http://www.seeedstudio.com/item_detail.html?p_id=2650/">Seeed Studio</option>
    </optgroup>
    <optgroup label="Europe">
        <option value="http://www.mouser.de/ProductDetail/Seeed-Studio/102010048">Mouser</option>
        <option value="http://www.seeedstudio.com/item_detail.html?p_id=2650/">Seeed Studio</option>
    </optgroup>
    <optgroup label="Japan">
        <option value="http://www.mouser.jp/ProductDetail/Seeed-Studio/102010048">Mouser</option>
        <option value="http://www.seeedstudio.com/item_detail.html?p_id=2650/">Seeed Studio</option>
    </optgroup>
    <optgroup label="China">
        <option value="http://www.mouser.cn/ProductDetail/Seeed-Studio/102010048">Mouser</option>
        <option value="http://www.seeedstudio.com/item_detail.html?p_id=2650/">Seeed Studio</option>
    </optgroup>
    <optgroup label="India">
        <option value="http://www.mouser.in/ProductDetail/Seeed-Studio/102010048">Mouser</option>
        <option value="http://www.seeedstudio.com/item_detail.html?p_id=2650/">Seeed Studio</option>
    </optgroup>
    <optgroup label="Asia Pacific">
        <option value="http://www.mouser.sg/ProductDetail/Seeed-Studio/102010048">Mouser</option>
        <option value="http://www.seeedstudio.com/item_detail.html?p_id=2650/">Seeed Studio</option>
    </optgroup>
</select>
<script>
        $('select.dropdown').each(function(){
          var list = $(this);
          var action = list.attr('id'); 
          list.change(function(){
           $('option:selected', this).each(function(){
            var label = $(this).text();
            var link = $(this).val();
            ga('send', 'event', 'exit', action, label);
            setTimeout('document.location = "' + link + '"', 100)
           });
          });
        });
</script>
